get.description: Get a single webhook by id

ClientSide.description: This shape is deprecated since 2024-01: Use Client Visibility feature instead

parent_id.description: Optional todolist ID to move the todo to a different parent

color.description: Valid colors: white, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, aqua, purple, gray, pink, brown

completion.description: Set to "on" to complete the step, "" (empty) to uncomplete

TodolistOrGroup.description: Union type for polymorphic todolist endpoint

name.description: Name (required for both Todolist and TodolistGroup)

WebhookCopy.description: Reference to a copied/moved recording in copy events.

WebhookEvent.description:
The event payload delivered to webhook URLs.
This is the body of an outbound webhook HTTP request.
Also appears as the body field in WebhookDelivery.request.
